text: kah do, "jo gumaraahee mein pada hua hai usake prati to yahee chaahie ki rahamaan usakee rassee khoob dheelee chhod de, yahaan tak ki jab aise log us cheez ko dekh lenge jisaka unase vaada kiya jaata hai - chaahe yaatana ho ya qiyaamat kee ghadee - to ve us samay jaan lenge ki apane sthaan kee spasht se kaun nikrsht aur jatthe kee drshti se adhik kamajor hai.
